This is really a fabulous place -- one of the best seafood meals I've had.  I have not seen lobster prepared so nicely, cut in half so it's easy to pull it out, and very fresh.  The traditional Catalan fish in the seafood platter was wonderful, as was the wine.  The waiter recommended wines based on our tastes and did not push us to the most expensive ones as so many others do.  Quantities are enormous -- think about ordering less than the number of people you have and sharing.  It's expensive, but you get what you pay for and this is worth it.  There is music at the table with traditional Catalan songs, and photos of your party.  It's an experience, one worth trying.
